title:
What are you allowed to do in the DOT right a way in front of your house?

Can you fill it in with dirt? Are you allowed to put a sprinkler system in the road right a way?

I have a neighbor who tells me I can not put dirt in front of my house on right a way.



Thanks
text:
Are you talking about the area of your yard that is adjacent to the
street? Like between a sidewalk and a street?
